casebody.data:
John Newman, respondent, v. Edmund C. Marshall, appellant. Decided December 22, 1884. Appeal from judgment and order denying motion for new trial. Edmund Van Ness, for appellant. William J. Hardy, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Van Vorst and Freedman, JJ.

Opinion

per Curiam.

Judgment and order appealed from affirmed, with costs.
